metadata.title: CVE-2022-24859 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: PyPDF2 is an open source python PDF library capable of splitting, merging,cropping, and transforming the pages of PDF files. In versions prior to1.27.5 an attacker who uses this vulnerability can craft a PDF which leadsto an infinite loop if the PyPDF2 if the code attempts to get the contentstream. The reason is that the last while-loop in`ContentStream._readInlineImage` only terminates when it finds the `EI`token, but never actually checks if the stream has already ended. Thisissue has been resolved in version `1.27.5`. Users unable to upgrade shouldvalidate and PDFs prior to iterating over their content stream.

criterions.comment: pypdf2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
